OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart reacts to taking offerings made at a shrine to Selûne, the rival of her goddess Shar. If Shadowheart is the avatar, she has a moment of introspection where she considers if she should take the items of not. If Shadowheart is a companion, she encourages the player to not take the items. The player can try talk her around, and may discover she is a Shar worshipper if they don't already know. The outcome of this dialogue potentially strengthens or damages Shadowheart's opinion of the player.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: You should leave it. Or even destroy it, if possible.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.context: InternalNodeContext: Companion Origin is speaker 1, Avatar is speaker 2

OM_Shadowheart_COM_76.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_76.text: This rubbish is an offering to Selûne. At best, it's worthless. At worst... who knows? Could be cursed.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_55.text: Do not trifle with that moon witch or her trinkets. Only trouble will follow.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_96.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_96.text: Why do you care so much?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: I should've just stayed quiet. You want the truth? Fine.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.text: I worship Shar, Mistress of the Night - Selûne's twin and foe.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_102.text: Because we've enough troubles and burdens as it is. Common sense, that's all.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_60.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_60.text: You're hiding something. You worship Shar, don't you?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_73.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_73.text: ... I should have been more discreet around you, clearly. Yes, you're right.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_29.text: Don't make a fuss, Selûnite - we may be at odds, but I have more important concerns than you right now.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: The goddess of secrets? How telling.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_0.text: I'll decide whether to make a fuss or not. Hard to trust someone who's holding out on me.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.text: Secrecy is everything for Shar's children. It's our code, our creed, our shield.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_84.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_84.text: I even keep secrets from myself - I had my memories suppressed, so that nothing I knew could be used against the Dark Lady. Once I prove myself, my memories will be restored.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_84.context: InternalNodeContext: This node only if the memory suppression beat wasn't established

OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: I'm not sorry I kept this from you. Not one bit.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: Though perhaps that might change, if you can show an open mind.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.context: NodeContext: Conceding jus a little towards the player's hurt feelings - but conditionally

OM_Shadowheart_COM_104.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_104.text: Let's see how open-minded I can be then: tell me more.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: Talk to me later. We've got more pressing matters to see to right now.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: We can discuss this later. But let's just try a little more honesty going forward.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_89.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_89.text: All we can do is try, I suppose...

OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_62.text: I don't know how I feel about this.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.text: Who says you have to feel anything?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_3.text: Gather your thoughts. Then perhaps we can talk some more.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_95.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_95.text: Don't make a big fuss...? You've been lying to me!

OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_81.text: A lie of omission at most. I'm sure you have some skeletons of your own hidden away.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: You could have told me. How long were you going to keep this secret?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_79.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_79.text: Forever, ideally. And you assume too much about what I can and cannot tell.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_65.text: I didn't agree to join up with a Shar worshipper.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_77.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_77.text: Then it's your own fault for not asking.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.text: Now that the truth's out, tell me more.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: It's been some time since I met another faithful of Shar. Are you versed in her teachings?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_68.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_68.text: Of course I am. But we can talk about this later - let's go.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.text: In future, I expect you to be honest. Let's leave it at that for now.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_86.text: Thank you for telling me, at least.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.text: Don't thank me - I'm breaking Lady Shar's teachings just by doing so... but sometimes you have to be practical.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.text: I can't trust you. Best if we travel separately for now.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_94.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_94.text: If you insist. Don't expect to fare well without me to save you.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.text: I don't care who you worship. We have bigger problems.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_56.text: True. I didn't think you'd react so pragmatically. Perhaps I should have told you sooner.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_58.text: Shar is an abomination. You deceived me.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: Your blindness as much as my deception, Selûnite. We can talk about this later - if you're willing.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_52.text: I bow to Shar also. The Dark Lady must favour us, to have brought us together.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_66.text: I... yes, she must. I'll offer thanks to her in my prayers - and we should speak more later. Alone, ideally.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.speaker: Karlach
OM_Shadowheart_COM_64.text: Fantastic. Monsters in our minds, and around our campfire.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_99.speaker: Astarion
OM_Shadowheart_COM_99.text: Heavens forbid. We're all entitled to our secrets.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_103.speaker: Wyll
OM_Shadowheart_COM_103.text: A Shar worshipper? Not my usual quarry - nor my usual ally.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Gale
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: You worship Shar? Blimey. She and my beloved Mystra are not exactly friends.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_106.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_106.text: Now that you have the truth, please don't make a big fuss about it.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: There's more. Use your parasite and enter her thoughts. Look for what she's hiding.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_23.text: *She's repelled by the Selûnite relics. They are an offence to her goddess - Shar.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.text: Agh - I can feel you, idiot. Keep out of my skull or I'll break yours open.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.text: I'll do as I please. If you want to try stopping me, be my guest.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_69.text: We can't just abandon resources that we might need. Be sensible.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_85.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_85.text: That's twice you've spoken ill of my goddess. Watch your mouth.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_92.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_92.text: That's my patron goddess you're besmirching. Watch your mouth.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: You were just about to loot this shrine - don't pretend you're offended now.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_78.text: I almost pity her, if you're the quality of follower she attracts.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_91.text: Trifling with that moon witch will only bring you trouble. Shar's guidance is clear.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.text: I'll do as I please. If you want to try stop me, be my guest.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_67.text: Fine. Perhaps you can sell them for a couple of coins.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.text: Take them if you must. But I'll remember you didn't listen to sense.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_88.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_88.text: We're in no position to abandon resources. I'm sure Shar will understand.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_82.text: No, this is perfect. You get to spite Selûne by stealing gifts meant for her.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_80.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_80.text: I decide what gods I heed. Not you.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: Watch your mouth, Sharran. That's twice you've spoken ill of my goddess.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.text: Spare me the indignity - you looked set to loot this sad little shrine.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_101.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_101.text: I never knew Selûne's followers were quite so wretched. Do as you please.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: That's my patron goddess you're besmirching. Watch your mouth, Sharran.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.text: If it matters that much to you, I'll leave it.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_54.text: Don't be ridiculous - there could be something useful here.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.text: These are offerings to Selûne. I won't destroy them.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_83.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_83.text: But you'll steal them? An interesting way to show your devotion.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_57.text: I do. Thank you for understanding.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_53.text: *You look at the Selûnite offerings. Nothing but profane baubles.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_90.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_90.text: *Still, they could be traded for something valuable.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: Taking them is the pragmatic choice.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: *But would Shar agree? Would she see it as accepting Selûnite gifts? Difficult to say.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_97.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_97.text: To even touch that filth would be to dishonour Shar.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_93.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_93.text: *But would Shar agree? She may be pleased to see offerings to Selûne stolen. Difficult to say.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_87.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_87.text: *You look at the Selûnite offerings. Nothing but profane baubles.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_71.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_71.text: *Still, they could be traded for something valuable.*

OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: *But would Shar agree? Would she see it as accepting Selûnite gifts? Difficult to say.*
